overview: Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response is a physical sensation of tingling that usually begins in the scalp and moves down through the body. ASMR WHISPERERS are primarily women who make videos and podcasts devoted to whispering and stimulating various triggers. While not overtly erotic, the intimacy of ASMR videos has led many to wonder whether it is a fetish or not. For those who think it is, this is where we come in!
title: ASMR Fantasy 2
